title: Mounam Pesum Lyrics Amara Kaaviyam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Mounam Pesum
Singer(s): K.S.Chitra, Sowmya Mahadevan
Movie:Â Amara Kaaviyam
Music: M Ghibran

Mounam Pesum Vaarthai Yaavum
Aethetho Aasaigal Thondriduthey
Kaalam Seiyum Maayam Pothum
Soodatha Pookalum Vaadiduthey
Pirivendru Aethum Illai
Uyir Endru Aana Pinne
Nee Endraal Nee Illai Naane Naanethaane
Methu Methuvaai Thiru Uruvaai Aanaai Aanaai

Aasai Aasai Kondu
Oosai Oosai Indri
Naalum Naanum Varuven
Kodi Kodi Yugam
Naadi Naadi Vanthu
Sevai Sevai Puriven

Negizhum Ninaivugal, Nenjil pesuthey
Kaalame Kaikodu
Kaathal Kaathal Ennalum Neela
Inithaane Vaazhvil Sera Oh..
Oru Nooru Aayul Vaazha

Mounam Pesum Vaarthai Yaavum
Aethetho Aasaigal Thondriduthey
Kaalam Seiyum Maayam Pothum
Soodatha Pookalum Vaadiduthey

Alaigal Polavea, Kaathal Mothume
Seruma Or Karai
Mothum Mothum Oyamal Mothum
Ornaalum Sernthey Theerum Oh..
Annaalum Vanthey Serum..

Aasai Aasai Kondu
Oosai Oosai Indri
Naalum Naanum Varuven
Kodi Kodi Yugam
Naadi Naadi Vanthu
Sevai Sevai Puriven
